name: Out of Power (SpectralGT)
description:
Its a Third Person Shooter game with Precudural Dungeon Generation.
Every move requires power.
If you ran out of Power then its game over.
_________________________________________________________________________
Controls  :
WASD / Arrow Keys : Movement.
Mouse : Camera Movement.
Left Click : Shoot.
_________________________________________________________________________
Your Goal :
Find and Get to the white door.
Don't run out of Power
_________________________________________________________________________
Theme : Power
Condition : Only 5 Colors.
Colors Used : White , Black , Red , Green , Grey
Time : 73 Hours.
_________________________________________________________________________
Tips :
1. Make every move strategically. Every move requires power.
2. If you found an opening in dungeon then don't go through the opening, you will get softlocked.
3. Don't go near Enemy they freak out.
_________________________________________________________________________
* Please report any bugs if found *
